
0.4.0 / 2012-08-31 
==================

  * add --reduce. Closes #10

0.3.0 / 2012-04-15 
==================

  * Added `-j, --json` to output json

0.2.0 / 2012-04-10 
==================

  * Added `-w, --within <ms>`
  * Added: allow multiple `--level`, `--select`, and `--type` flags
  * Added `-t, --type <name>` flag
  * Changed `.msg` -> `.type`

0.1.0 / 2012-04-08 
==================

  * Added `-f, --ignore-eof` support to jog(1)

0.0.1 / 2010-01-03
==================

  * Initial release
